      • testDAA

        public void testDAA()
        Decimal Addition Adjust. The Half-Carry flag is not affected by this instruction. The Negative flag is set equal to the new value of bit 7 in Accumulator A. The Zero flag is set if the new value of Accumulator A is zero; cleared otherwise. The affect this instruction has on the Overflow flag is undefined. The Carry flag is set if the BCD addition produced a carry; cleared otherwise.

        public void testLEASinc2()
        Increase the stack register by two. (LEAS +$ 2,S.) LEA only allows indexed mode.

      • testLEASdec2

        public void testLEASdec2()
        Decrease the stack register by two. (LEAS -$ 2,S.) LEA only allows indexed mode.

        LEAX D,Y

      • testMUL

        public void testMUL()
        Multiply 0x0C with 0x64. Result is 0x04B0. The Zero flag is set if the 16-bit result is zero; cleared otherwise. The Carry flag is set equal to the new value of bit 7 in Accumulator B.

      • testMUL0

        public void testMUL0()
        Multiply 0x0C with 0x00. Result is 0x0000. The Zero flag is set if the 16-bit result is zero; cleared otherwise. The Carry flag is set equal to the new value of bit 7 in Accumulator B.

      • testNEG

        public void testNEG()
        Test the NEG - Negate instruction.

      • testTSTmemory

        public void testTSTmemory()
        Test the instruction TST. TST: The Z and N bits are affected according to the value of the specified operand. The V bit is cleared.
